title: Patch 6.21 Failed to update
body:
I opened up league today and it started updating, but after a while it says update failed. I have reinstalled the game, restarted my laptop, and tried switching servers, it does nothing. Any help would be very appreciated :) 
PS I am sure that connection problems are not a factor.

replies.body: Same this is happening to me :( and idk what to do
